shortdesc.ph: Porivdes APIs for rendering videos. This class inherits all APIs from the class, but enables you to render video images with high resolutions (such as 4K) faster and at higher frame rates.

The SDK supports using different VideoSurface to render different video sources; for example, using to render the video images of user A and for user B. Note that video images from the same video source can only be rendered either through or .
